properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 13 at 6:35PM CST until January 14 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog.

* WHERE...Portions of south central and southeast Texas.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM CST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
properties.instruction:
Motorists should drive with extreme caution and allow additional
travel time. Use low beams...reduce driving speed...and allow for
plenty of room between you and other cars. You can overtake
another vehicle quickly in poor visibilities...so slow down and
drive defensively.

Be on the lookout for sudden changes in visibility. The patchy
nature of the fog will drop visibilities quickly in a short
distance. In addition...visibilities may become severely
restricted near rivers...lakes...bridges...and low lying areas.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST TUESDAY
